shortdesc.ph: Aggregates statistics of each network path in multipath transmission.

section.p: represents statistics for multipath transmission, including the number of bytes sent and received through LAN, Wi-Fi, and mobile network paths, the number of currently active paths, and detailed statistics for each path.

plentry.pd: Total number of bytes sent over LAN.
The number of video bytes sent through the LAN path.
The number of bytes sent through the LAN path.
Total number of bytes received over LAN.
The number of video bytes received through the LAN path.
The number of bytes received through the LAN path.
Total number of bytes sent over Wi-Fi.
The number of video bytes sent through the Wi-Fi path.
The number of bytes sent through the Wi-Fi path.
Total number of bytes received over Wi-Fi.
The number of video bytes received through the Wi-Fi path.
The number of bytes received through the Wi-Fi path.
Total number of bytes sent over mobile data.
The number of video bytes sent through the mobile network path.
The number of bytes sent through the mobile network path.
Total number of bytes received over mobile data.
The number of video bytes received through the mobile network path.
The number of bytes received through the mobile network path.
The number of active paths.
The number of currently active paths.
